title: Steam Coast Trail Phase 2 Walking and Cycle Route

images.title: Basher Eyre / Steam train entering cutting just past Washford Station
images.caption: Steam train entering cutting just past Washford Station

images.title: Departure from Washford by Gareth James, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Departure from Washford

description: This is Phase 2 of the Steam Coast Trail running from Old Cleeve (Dragon's Cross) to Washford (Cobbler's Steps). The route runs along the West Somerset Coast Railway along a shared cycling and walking path. Please click here to see the Steam Coast Trail Phase 1 running from Dunster Beach to Blue Anchor .
